resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108220</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108220</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202726</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">War Is...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krieg Ist...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Guerre A lieu...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Guerra Realiza-se...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Guerra Ha luogo...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πόλεμος είναι...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Guerra Es...</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Upon consideration of the perspectives on war from their classmates, the poet Stephen Crane in "War is Kind," and various characters from All Quiet on the Western Front, students will write an editorial for the school newspaper in which they share opinions about war.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nach Erwägung der Perspektiven auf Krieg von 
ihren Mitschülern, ist der Dichter Stephen Kran "im Krieg," 
freundlich und verschiedene Zeichen von ganz auf stille Art auf der 
westlichen Frontseite, Kursteilnehmer schreiben einen Leitartikel für
die Schulezeitung, in der sie Meinungen über Krieg teilen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur la considération des perspectives sur la 
guerre de leurs camarades de classe, la grue de Stephen de poèt 
dans la "guerre est aimable," et les divers caractères de toute la 
Tranquillité sur l'avant occidental, étudiants écriront un éditorial 
pour le journal d'école en lequel ils partagent des avis au sujet de 
guerre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em cima da consideração dos perspectives na 
guerra de seus classmates, o guindaste de Stephen do poeta na "guerra 
é amável," e os vários caráteres de toda quiet na parte dianteira 
ocidental, estudantes escreverão um editorial para o jornal da escola
em que compartilham de opiniões sobre a guerra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Su considerazione delle prospettive sulla guerra 
dai loro classmates, la gru di Stephen del poet "nella guerra è 
gentile," ed i vari caratteri da tutto il quiet sulla parte anteriore 
occidentale, allievi scriveranno un editoriale per il giornale della 
scuola in cui ripartiscono le opinioni circa la guerra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επάνω στην εκτίμηση των προοπτικών στον πόλεμο από 
τους συμμαθητές τους, ο ποιητής stephen Crane "στον πόλεμο 
είναι καλός," και οι διάφοροι χαρακτήρες από όλους ήρεμους στο 
δυτικό μέτωπο, σπουδαστές θα γράψουν ένα κύριο άρθρο για τη 
σχολική εφημερίδα στην οποία συμμερίζονται τις απόψεις για τον 
πόλεμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sobre la consideración de las perspectivas en 
guerra de sus classmates, la grúa de Stephen del poeta en "guerra es 
buena," y los varios caracteres de todo silenciosamente en el frente 
occidental, estudiantes escribirán un editorial para el periódico de
la escuela en el cual comparten opiniones sobre guerra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
